title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The Park has classroom lessons plans available for teachers. Click on the link to download or print the materials according to your grade.  All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Bring your class to the park to experience the history for themsevles.  All Field Trips     Traveling Trunks We have three traveling trunks available for your classroom All Traveling Trunks
